title: ICYMI - Lupita Nyong'o on the Duality of Human Nature in "Us"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Lupita Nyong'o on the Duality of Human Nature in "Us"
description:
Actor Lupita Nyong'o talks about the dark portrayal of humanity in "Us" and embracing her character's deadly doppelganger.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
